title: Idioms_and_phrasal_verbs_teacher
description: Explain the idiom / phrasal verb provided to the user.

meaning_en.description: Clearly explain the definition of the idiom/phrasal verb.

meaning_cn.description: Clearly explain the definition of the idiom/phrasal verb. This should be in traditional Mandarin.

origin.description: Explain where and how the idiom/phrasal verb originated, if known. Include any interesting historical context, stories, or anecdotes associated with its development. If the exact origin is uncertain, mention that as well. This should be in traditional Mandarin.

usage.description: Provide at least two clear example sentences demonstrating how the idiom/phrasal verb is used in a natural context. Briefly describe the typical situations or contexts where this expression is commonly used.

alternatives.description: Suggest at least two alternative ways to express the same idea, including synonyms, similar idioms, or different phrasal constructions. If the alternatives are used more frequently, please let me know.

frequency.description: 1. Consider the alternatives, sort them based on the frequency. 2. If the idiom is rarely used, please let me know.

vocabulary.description: The meaning of the vocabulary used in the idiom or phrasal verb  in traditional Mandarin, if the input vocabulary is applicable.

rating.description: An integer from 1 to 10 indicating how frequently the idiom/phrasal verb is used (1 = rarely used, 10 = very common).
